label: Online Community Platform Management
description: AI-powered community infrastructure with health monitoring and automated engagement programs increasing active participation by 40-60% and member retention by 50-70%.

traditional.workflow: 1. Community manager manually sets up forum categories and discussion threads. 2. Monitors basic metrics (total members, posts per day) in platform admin panel. 3. Manually creates engagement initiatives (weekly discussion prompts, contests). 4. Technical issues escalated to IT with 2-3 day resolution time. 5. Limited understanding of community health beyond basic activity counts.
constraints: Manual forum setup doesn't scale across multiple product lines
Basic metrics (post count, members) don't reveal engagement quality
Manual engagement programs limited to 1-2 per month
Technical infrastructure issues cause member frustration
No visibility into declining engagement until members churn
Can't identify or nurture super users and advocates

agentic.workflow: 1. Platform Orchestration Agent manages technical infrastructure: uptime monitoring, performance optimization, automated scaling during traffic spikes, integration with CRM and support systems. 2. Community Health Agent tracks engagement quality: active vs lurker ratios, response time in threads, sentiment trends, churn risk scoring. 3. Engagement Program Agent automates initiatives: personalized onboarding for new members, discussion prompts based on trending topics, gamification triggers and celebrations, re-engagement campaigns for inactive members. 4. Technical Support Agent proactively identifies and resolves platform issues.
dataSources: Community member profiles and activity history
Discussion threads and post engagement metrics
benefits: 40-60% increase in active participation through personalized engagement
50-70% improvement in member retention via churn prediction
Automated health monitoring identifies issues before member impact
3-5x more engagement programs enabled by automation
99.9% platform uptime vs manual monitoring gaps
Super user identification enables advocacy program development

label: Community Engagement & Moderation
description: AI-assisted moderation with sentiment analysis and power user identification scaling moderation capacity from 100 posts/day to 10,000+ while improving quality.

traditional.workflow: 1. Community moderator manually reviews every post and comment in chronological order. 2. Relies on member reports to flag inappropriate content (reactive approach). 3. Manually identifies spam and off-topic posts. 4. Apply moderation actions (delete, warn, ban) inconsistently based on individual judgment. 5. Can realistically moderate 100-150 posts per day maximum.
constraints: Manual review limited to 100-150 posts/day (doesn't scale)
Chronological review misses high-priority toxic content
Reactive moderation means inappropriate content visible for hours
Inconsistent policy enforcement across multiple moderators
Can't identify power users or quality contributors proactively
After-hours and weekend content goes unmoderated

agentic.workflow: 1. Content Moderation Agent pre-screens all posts using: toxicity detection (hate speech, harassment), spam filtering, off-topic identification, policy violation flagging. 2. Priority Routing Agent surfaces high-risk content first for human review. 3. Engagement Scoring Agent identifies quality contributors: helpful answer rate, positive sentiment contributions, expert knowledge in topic areas, community leadership potential. 4. Power User Agent recommends members for moderator or ambassador roles. 5. Consistency Agent ensures policy enforcement aligned across human moderators.
dataSources: Member activity history and reputation scores
benefits: 100x moderation capacity (10,000+ posts/day vs 100-150)
Proactive toxic content detection in seconds vs reactive hours
95%+ policy consistency through AI enforcement guidance
Power user identification enables community-led moderation
24/7 automated pre-screening with human review for edge cases
Quality contributor recognition drives engagement
metrics: Response time: Real-time AI + human review

hitlGate.threshold: Content flagged as potentially harmful or edge case
hitlGate.policy: Human moderator reviews AI-flagged content before action taken

quickWins: Deploy toxicity detection for high-risk keywords

label: Community-Driven Support (Peer-to-Peer)
description: AI-powered peer support with intelligent question routing and answer quality scoring reducing support costs by 30-50% while improving response time by 60-80%.

traditional.workflow: 1. Customer posts question in general community forum. 2. Relies on random community members to see and answer (no targeted routing). 3. No quality control on answers (incorrect solutions posted as facts). 4. Questions often go unanswered or receive low-quality responses. 5. Community support seen as unreliable, customers escalate directly to support team.
constraints: Questions posted to general forum don't reach topic experts
30-40% of questions go unanswered or poorly answered
No answer quality validation (misinformation spreads)
Can't identify subject matter experts in community
Low confidence in peer support drives unnecessary escalations
Duplicate questions answered repeatedly (no knowledge capture)

agentic.workflow: 1. Question Routing Agent analyzes incoming questions and routes to: relevant topic categories, members with expertise in subject area, similar previously answered questions (avoid duplicates). 2. Expert Identification Agent maps community members to knowledge areas based on: answer history and quality, topic engagement patterns, validated expertise. 3. Answer Quality Agent scores responses using: accuracy validation against knowledge base, helpfulness votes from community, solution confirmation by original poster. 4. Knowledge Base Agent captures high-quality Q&A pairs for future search. 5. Escalation Agent routes complex issues to support team when community can't solve.
dataSources: Member expertise profiles and answer history
benefits: 30-50% support cost reduction through deflection to community
60-80% faster response time (community vs support queue)
90%+ question resolution rate vs 60-70% random posting
Answer quality validation prevents misinformation
Expert identification enables targeted routing
Knowledge capture eliminates duplicate question answering

label: Gamification & Rewards
description: AI-driven gamification with personalized challenges and recognition increasing member engagement by 40-60% and content contributions by 3-5x.

traditional.workflow: 1. Community manager manually tracks top contributors in spreadsheet. 2. Generic point system for any activity (1 point per post, no quality distinction). 3. Manually create monthly leaderboard showing top 10 members. 4. Send occasional 'thank you' messages to active members. 5. Limited rewards (badges displayed on profile but no tangible value).
constraints: Manual tracking doesn't scale beyond basic activity counts
Generic points don't differentiate quality vs quantity contributions
Monthly leaderboards create winners/losers (demotivates most members)
Manual recognition limited to handful of top contributors
Badges provide no tangible value (low motivation)
No personalized challenges or goals for different member types

agentic.workflow: 1. Points & Progression Agent awards differentiated points based on: contribution quality and helpfulness, topic expertise demonstration, community support activities, milestone achievements. 2. Badge & Achievement Agent triggers recognition for: first helpful answer, 10 solved questions, community welcome (helping new members), category expertise. 3. Personalized Challenge Agent creates custom goals: encourage lurkers to post first question, prompt experts to answer in new topics, nudge intermittent members back to activity. 4. Leaderboard Agent shows multiple dimensions (not just single ranking): most helpful this month, rising stars, category experts. 5. Rewards Management Agent enables point redemption for: discounts and offers, exclusive access to products or events, charity donations.
benefits: 40-60% increase in member engagement through personalization
3-5x content contribution volume via quality recognition
Multi-dimensional leaderboards motivate diverse participation styles
Automated achievement triggers vs manual recognition
Tangible rewards (discounts, perks) drive redemption and loyalty
Personalized challenges activate lurkers and inactive members

quickWins: Implement automated badges for key milestones

label: Community Analytics & Health Scoring
description: AI-powered community health analytics with predictive churn modeling and sentiment tracking enabling proactive interventions that reduce churn by 50-70%.

traditional.workflow: 1. Community manager reviews basic metrics weekly (total members, posts per day, new registrations). 2. Manually export data to spreadsheet for trend analysis. 3. Notice declining engagement after members have already churned. 4. Limited visibility into member sentiment or satisfaction. 5. Reporting shows what happened but not why or what to do about it.
constraints: Basic metrics (post count, members) don't reveal engagement quality
Weekly manual reporting too slow to catch declining engagement
Churn identified reactively (after members leave)
No sentiment tracking to gauge community health
Can't predict which members at risk of becoming inactive
Metrics show symptoms not root causes or solutions

agentic.workflow: 1. Engagement Metrics Agent tracks quality indicators: active vs lurker ratios, post response time, discussion depth (multi-turn conversations), helpful answer rate. 2. Sentiment Analysis Agent monitors community mood: overall sentiment trends, negative sentiment spikes (indicating frustration), topic-level sentiment (which areas thriving vs struggling). 3. Churn Prediction Agent identifies at-risk members: declining activity patterns, negative sentiment in posts, lack of recognition or response, approaching milestone without engagement. 4. Health Scoring Agent calculates overall community health index combining multiple dimensions. 5. Intervention Agent recommends proactive actions: re-engagement outreach, topic area improvements, moderation interventions.
benefits: 50-70% churn reduction through predictive intervention
Real-time health scoring vs weekly lagging indicators
Sentiment tracking identifies community issues before escalation
Proactive member re-engagement vs reactive churn management
Root cause analysis reveals why engagement declining
Automated alerts enable timely intervention

label: Advocacy & Ambassador Programs
description: AI-driven ambassador identification and program management delivering 3-5x more advocacy impact through data-driven selection and personalized engagement.

traditional.workflow: 1. Community manager manually selects 5-10 highly active members as ambassadors. 2. Create one-size-fits-all ambassador program (monthly challenges, exclusive access). 3. Manually track ambassador activities in spreadsheet. 4. Send monthly email newsletter to ambassadors. 5. Limited measurement of program impact or ambassador effectiveness.
constraints: Manual selection based on activity alone (misses influential but less active members)
Generic program doesn't leverage individual ambassador strengths
Limited to 5-10 ambassadors (can't scale beyond manual management)
Spreadsheet tracking doesn't capture full ambassador impact
Monthly touchpoints insufficient to maintain engagement
No performance measurement or ROI tracking

agentic.workflow: 1. Ambassador Identification Agent scores members on multiple dimensions: community influence and reach, content quality and helpfulness, brand alignment and passion, external social presence, expertise in specific topics. 2. Segmentation Agent creates ambassador tiers: mega advocates (high influence), expert contributors (deep knowledge), community connectors (bring others together), brand evangelists (external promotion). 3. Program Management Agent personalizes engagement: assign missions matching ambassador strengths, provide exclusive content and early access, facilitate brand collaboration opportunities. 4. Performance Tracking Agent measures ambassador impact: community engagement driven, support deflection contribution, external brand promotion, new member recruitment. 5. Reward & Recognition Agent automates appreciation.
benefits: 3-5x advocacy impact through data-driven selection
50-100 active ambassadors vs 5-10 manual program
Personalized engagement matches ambassador strengths and interests
Automated performance tracking shows clear ROI
Tiered program structure enables scaled management
Ambassador-driven support deflection reduces cost 20-40%

label: Community Content Moderation
description: AI-powered content scanning with policy enforcement and escalation workflows achieving 95%+ detection accuracy while reducing manual moderation burden by 80-90%.

traditional.workflow: 1. Human moderator reviews reported content after members flag it. 2. Manually read each flagged post to determine if it violates policies. 3. Apply moderation action (warn, delete, ban) based on moderator judgment. 4. No proactive scanning (inappropriate content visible until reported). 5. Moderation decisions inconsistent across different moderators interpreting policies.
constraints: Reactive moderation only after member reports (content visible for hours)
Manual review doesn't scale (can handle 50-100 flags per day)
Inconsistent policy interpretation across moderators
No proactive detection of borderline or evolving policy violations
Complex cases (context-dependent violations) often mishandled
After-hours violations go unaddressed until next business day

agentic.workflow: 1. Content Scanning Agent proactively analyzes all posts in real-time: hate speech and harassment detection, profanity and explicit content filtering, spam and promotional content identification, personally identifiable information flagging. 2. Policy Enforcement Agent matches violations to specific policy guidelines. 3. Severity Classification Agent categorizes violations: auto-remove (clear violations), human review needed (borderline cases), context required (depends on thread discussion). 4. Escalation Workflow Agent routes: clear violations to auto-moderation, edge cases to human moderator, severe violations to senior moderation team. 5. Audit Trail Agent logs all decisions for consistency review.
benefits: 95%+ detection accuracy vs reactive member reporting
80-90% reduction in manual moderation burden
Real-time proactive scanning vs hours-delayed reactive response
Consistent policy enforcement through AI-guided decisions
24/7 automated protection vs business hours only
Human moderators focus on complex edge cases requiring judgment

hitlGate.policy: Human moderator reviews AI classification before action for edge cases

quickWins: Deploy AI toxicity detection for hate speech
